verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> <WH8798> thy face <WH6440> toward Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and drop <WH5197> <WH8685> thy word toward the holy places <WH4720>, and prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> against the land <WH127> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>,

And say <WH559> <WH8804> to the land <WH127> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; Behold, I am against thee, and will draw forth <WH3318> <WH8689> my sword <WH2719> out of his sheath <WH8593>, and will cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> from thee the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked <WH7563>.

Seeing <WH3282> then that I will cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> from thee the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked <WH7563>, therefore shall my sword <WH2719> go forth <WH3318> <WH8799> out of his sheath <WH8593> against all flesh <WH1320> from the south <WH5045> to the north <WH6828>:

That all flesh <WH1320> may know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I the YY <WH3068> have drawn forth <WH3318> <WH8689> my sword <WH2719> out of his sheath <WH8593>: it shall not return <WH7725> <WH8799> any more.
Sigh <WH584> <WH8734> therefore, thou son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, with the breaking <WH7670> of thy loins <WH4975>; and with bitterness <WH4814> sigh <WH584> <WH8735> before their eyes <WH5869>.

And it shall be, when they say <WH559> <WH8799> unto thee, Wherefore sighest <WH584> <WH8737> thou? that thou shalt answer <WH559> <WH8804>, For the tidings <WH8052>; because it cometh <WH935> <WH8802>: and every heart <WH3820> shall melt <WH4549> <WH8738>, and all hands <WH3027> shall be feeble <WH7503> <WH8804>, and every spirit <WH7307> shall faint <WH3543> <WH8765>, and all knees <WH1290> shall be weak <WH3212> <WH8799> as water <WH4325>: behold, it cometh <WH935> <WH8802>, and shall be brought to pass <WH1961> <WH8738>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
Again the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734>, and say <WH559> <WH8804>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; Say <WH559> <WH8798>, A sword <WH2719>, a sword <WH2719> is sharpened <WH2300> <WH8717>, and also furbished <WH4803> <WH8803>:

It is sharpened <WH2300> <WH8717> to make a sore <WH2874> slaughter <WH2873> <WH8800>; it is furbished <WH4178> <WH8794> that it may glitter <WH1300>: should <WH176> we then make mirth <WH7797> <WH8799>? it contemneth <WH3988> <WH8802> the rod <WH7626> of my son <WH1121>, as every tree <WH6086>.

And he hath given <WH5414> <WH8799> it to be furbished <WH4803> <WH8800>, that it may be handled <WH3709> <WH8610> <WH8800>: this sword <WH2719> is sharpened <WH2300> <WH8717>, and it is furbished <WH4178> <WH8794>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> it into the hand <WH3027> of the slayer <WH2026> <WH8802>.

Cry <WH2199> <WH8798> and howl <WH3213> <WH8685>, son <WH1121> of man <WH120>: for it shall be upon my people <WH5971>, it shall be upon all the princes <WH5387> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: terrors <WH4048> <WH8803> by reason of <WH413> the sword <WH2719> shall be upon my people <WH5971>: smite <WH5606> <WH8798> therefore upon thy thigh <WH3409>.
Because it is a trial <WH974> <WH8795>, and what if the sword contemn <WH3988> <WH8802> even the rod <WH7626>? it shall be no more, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Thou therefore, son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734>, and smite <WH5221> thine hands <WH3709> <WH3709> together <WH5221> <WH8685>, and let the sword <WH2719> be doubled <WH3717> <WH8735> the third <WH7992> time, the sword <WH2719> of the slain <WH2491>: it is the sword <WH2719> of the great <WH1419> men that are slain <WH2491>, which entereth into their privy chambers <WH2314> <WH8802>.

I have set <WH5414> <WH8804> the point <WH19> of the sword <WH2719> against all their gates <WH8179>, that their heart <WH3820> may faint <WH4127> <WH8800>, and their ruins <WH4383> be multiplied <WH7235> <WH8687>: ah <WH253> ! it is made <WH6213> <WH8803> bright <WH1300>, it is wrapped up <WH4593> for the slaughter <WH2874>.

Go thee one way or other <WH258> <WH8690>, either on <WH7760> <WH8685> the right hand <WH3231> <WH8685>, or on the left <WH8041> <WH8685>, whithersoever <WH575> thy face <WH6440> is set <WH3259> <WH8716>.
I will also smite <WH5221> <WH8686> mine hands <WH3709> together <WH3709>, and I will cause my fury <WH2534> to rest <WH5117> <WH8689>: I the YY <WH3068> have said <WH1696> <WH8765> it.
The word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me again, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Also, thou son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, appoint <WH7760> <WH8798> thee two <WH8147> ways <WH1870>, that the sword <WH2719> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> may come <WH935> <WH8800>: both twain <WH8147> shall come forth <WH3318> <WH8799> out of one <WH259> land <WH776>: and choose <WH1254> <WH8761> thou a place <WH3027>, choose <WH1254> <WH8761> it at the head <WH7218> of the way <WH1870> to the city <WH5892>.

Appoint <WH7760> <WH8799> a way <WH1870>, that the sword <WH2719> may come <WH935> <WH8800> to Rabbath <WH7237> of the Ammonites <WH1121> <WH5983>, and to Y'hudah <WH3063> in Yerushalayim <WH3389> the defenced <WH1219> <WH8803>.

For the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> stood <WH5975> <WH8804> at the parting <WH517> of the way <WH1870>, at the head <WH7218> of the two <WH8147> ways <WH1870>, to use <WH7080> <WH8800> divination <WH7081>: he made his arrows <WH2671> bright <WH7043> <WH8773>, he consulted <WH7592> <WH8804> with images <WH8655>, he looked <WH7200> <WH8804> in the liver <WH3516>.

At his right hand <WH3225> was the divination <WH7081> for Yerushalayim <WH3389>, to appoint <WH7760> <WH8800> captains <WH3733>, to open <WH6605> <WH8800> the mouth <WH6310> in the slaughter <WH7524>, to lift up <WH7311> <WH8687> the voice <WH6963> with shouting <WH8643>, to appoint <WH7760> <WH8800> battering rams <WH3733> against the gates <WH8179>, to cast <WH8210> <WH8800> a mount <WH5550>, and to build <WH1129> <WH8800> a fort <WH1785>.

And it shall be unto them as a false <WH7723> divination <WH7080> <WH8800> in their sight <WH5869>, to them that have sworn <WH7650> <WH8803> oaths <WH7621>: but he will call to remembrance <WH2142> <WH8688> the iniquity <WH5771>, that they may be taken <WH8610> <WH8736>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because ye have made your iniquity <WH5771> to be remembered <WH2142> <WH8687>, in that your transgressions <WH6588> are discovered <WH1540> <WH8736>, so that in all your doings <WH5949> your sins <WH2403> do appear <WH7200> <WH8736>; because, I say, that ye are come to remembrance <WH2142> <WH8736>, ye shall be taken <WH8610> <WH8735> with the hand <WH3709>.
And thou, profane <WH2491> wicked <WH7563> prince <WH5387> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, whose day <WH3117> is come <WH935> <WH8804>, when <WH6256> iniquity <WH5771> shall have an end <WH7093>,

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Remove <WH5493> <WH8685> the diadem <WH4701>, and take off <WH7311> <WH8685> the crown <WH5850>: this shall not be the same <WH2063>: exalt <WH1361> <WH8687> him that is low <WH8217>, and abase <WH8213> <WH8687> him that is high <WH1364>.

I will overturn <WH5754>, overturn <WH5754>, overturn <WH5754>, it: and it shall be <WH7760> <WH8799> no more, until he come <WH935> <WH8800> whose right <WH4941> it is; and I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> it him.

And thou, son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> and say <WH559> <WH8804>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> concerning the Ammonites <WH1121> <WH5983>, and concerning their reproach <WH2781>; even say <WH559> <WH8804> thou, The sword <WH2719>, the sword <WH2719> is drawn <WH6605> <WH8803>: for the slaughter <WH2874> it is furbished <WH4803> <WH8803>, to consume <WH398> <WH8687> because of the glittering <WH1300>:

Whiles they see <WH2372> <WH8800> vanity <WH7723> unto thee, whiles they divine <WH7080> <WH8800> a lie <WH3577> unto thee, to bring <WH5414> <WH8800> thee upon the necks <WH6677> of them that are slain <WH2491>, of the wicked <WH7563>, whose day <WH3117> is come <WH935> <WH8804>, when <WH6256> their iniquity <WH5771> shall have an end <WH7093>.

Shall I cause it to return <WH7725> <WH8685> into his sheath <WH8593>? I will judge <WH8199> <WH8799> thee in the place <WH4725> where thou wast created <WH1254> <WH8738>, in the land <WH776> of thy nativity <WH4351>.

And I will pour out <WH8210> <WH8804> mine indignation <WH2195> upon thee, I will blow <WH6315> <WH8686> against thee in the fire <WH784> of my wrath <WH5678>, and deliver <WH5414> <WH8804> thee into the hand <WH3027> of brutish <WH1197> <WH8802> men <WH582>, and skilful <WH2796> to destroy <WH4889>.

Thou shalt be for fuel <WH402> to the fire <WH784>; thy blood <WH1818> shall be in the midst <WH8432> of the land <WH776>; thou shalt be no more remembered <WH2142> <WH8735>: for I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it.
